name: Rush - League of Villains
description:
The unique strategy of a tower defense game that has never been seen.


***Highlights***
• Villains are overpowering and immoral, if expecting an attack to happen in predetermined path, then forget it. Villain attacks are wicked and unpredictable.


• Every self-defense and hero is vulnerable and can be destroyed by the villains at any moment.


• 300+ Villains 50+ Boss 20+ Villain skill attacks. No rules, attacks based on AI strategy.


• 20+ Heroes, 3 special skill attacks.


• Classic, short battles with a range of 10-20 waves, impossible to defense!


• Dungeons and hidden treasure and gameplay is varied.


• No Wi-Fi? No worries, just play offline!

***Theme***
“Every super power worthless punching bag are not called Hero. The Hero comes from powerful battles like a wounded lion scream which far more terrifying than its roar!”


Are you prepared to fight the Rushers?
